Kismet

CAFE

See the menu

Since

1994


Kismet Cafe has been a family owned and operated restaurant. Located next to the University of Texas campus, Kismet serves hearty food that tastes just like home.


Rated as one of the best Middle Eastern cuisines in Austin, Kismet Cafe is a good example of authentic, high-quality yet affordable food.
